term.title: recognition site

item.text: A nucleotidesequence to which a protein binds specifically.
An amino acid sequence in an antibody molecule to which the specific antigen binds specifically.

term.sources: 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' Nagel, B.;Dellweg, H.;Gierasch, L.M.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1992 64(1) 143
